welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Laurens, a charming city known for its quaint downtown, friendly locals, and beautiful landscapes. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that our city has to offer and making unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greenwood Airport serves all domestic flights and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Greenwood Airport handles all freight and logistics operations for the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Donaldson Center Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Donaldson Center Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greenville Spartanburg International Airport is the primary hub for all commercial flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The General Aviation Terminal at Greenville Spartanburg International Airport is used for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
